hero.subtitle: Instant game server hosting with flexible, hourly billing. Pay only for what you use. No monthly contracts, no hidden fees.

instant.title: Instant Deployment
instant.description: Launch Minecraft, Valheim, or Rust servers in under 60 seconds. Our automated provisioning handles the heavy lifting.

billing.title: Hourly Billing
billing.description: Stop paying for idle servers. Top up credits and only pay while your server is running. Perfect for weekend gaming sessions.

storage.title: Persistent Storage
storage.description: Your world files are safe even when the server is stopped. We automatically back up your data to secure cloud storage.
